title: Report a Station Maintenance Issue
description: A passenger reports that an escalator at a train station is broken. An agent must create a maintenance ticket.

tasks.description: Receive a passenger report via social media about a broken escalator at a specific station.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent captures the location and nature of the issue.

tasks.description: Create a new maintenance work order in the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new work order is created.

tasks.description: Assign the work order to the station maintenance team with a high priority.
tasks.expected_outcome: The correct team is assigned to fix the issue.

tasks.description: Post a reply on social media thanking the passenger for the report and informing them that a crew has been dispatched.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent provides good customer service by closing the loop.
